org.springframework.cloud.gcp.autoconfigure.logging

Class TraceIdLoggingWebMvcInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • HandlerInterceptorAdapter
      • org.springframework.cloud.gcp.autoconfigure.logging.TraceIdLoggingWebMvcInterceptor

  • public class TraceIdLoggingWebMvcInterceptor
extends HandlerInterceptorAdapter
    org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor that extracts the request trace ID from the "x-cloud-trace-context" HTTP header and stores it in a thread-local using TraceIdLoggingEnhancer.setCurrentTraceId(java.lang.String).

    The TraceIdLoggingEnhancer can then be used in a logging appender to add the trace ID metadata to log messages.

    Author:
    Mike Eltsufin, Chengyuan Zhao
